Welcome to nrt-bfn-qg's documentation!
======================================

A wrapper for BFN-QG - dynamic mapping of ocean topography by altimetric data assimilation.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   NRT_BFN_main
   NRT_BFN_main_config
   tools
